titleStmt.title: Mercy magnified on a penitent prodigal, or, A brief discourse wherein Christs parable of the lost son found is opened and applied as it was delivered in sundry sermons / by Samuel Willard ...
titleStmt.author: Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.
